title: Kanban Board
description: Kanban Board is a visual tool that gives an overview of the tasks and activities, it helps sort and group the tasks according to priority or user.

title: Post It !
description: This project allows user to create and read posts. It uses mongoDB to store data in database. User can delete as well edit the post apart from creation.

title: Flight Booking System
description: Via this project user can book the available flights and get the data of the recent bookings along with the details of the user and date-time of booking.
